remarks: Given two open maps ` F ` and ` G ` , ` H ` mapping pairs of sets, is also an open map for the product topology.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Dec-2019.)
statement:
txomap.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> Z ) $.
txomap.g $e |- ( ph -> G : Y --> T ) $.
txomap.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
txomap.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
txomap.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` Z ) ) $.
txomap.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( TopOn ` T ) ) $.
txomap.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. J ) -> ( F " x ) e. L ) $.
txomap.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. K ) -> ( G " y ) e. M ) $.
txomap.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( J tX K ) ) $.
txomap.h $e |- H = ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> <. ( F ` x ) , ( G ` y ) >. ) $.
txomap $p |- ( ph -> ( H " A ) e. ( L tX M ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
